body_html:
OK, I use nfs fix this problem. As below, node0 is my worker server 0 (master).

with tf.train.MonitoredTrainingSession(master=server.target,
is_chief=(FLAGS.task_index == 0),
checkpoint_dir="/home/node0_nfs_share",
hooks=hooks) as mon_sess:

But I also think this is a little bug should be fixed.

body:
OK, I use nfs fix this problem. As below, node0 is my worker server 0 (master).
 
   with tf.train.MonitoredTrainingSession(master=server.target,
                                           is_chief=(FLAGS.task_index == 0),
                                           checkpoint_dir="/home/node0_nfs_share",
                                           hooks=hooks) as mon_sess:

But I also think this is a little bug should be fixed.
